cpit380practice

Class SlideShow

  • java.lang.Object
    • cpit380practice.SlideShow
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MusicalSlideShow

    public class SlideShow
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents a slide show. A slide show has an array of pictures, a time to wait between pictures, and a title that is shown at the beginning of the show.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SlideShow()
      A no-argument constructor that takes no parameters and leaves fields with their default values
      SlideShow(Picture[] pictArray)
      Constructor that takes the array of pictures
      SlideShow(Picture[] pictArray, int time, java.lang.String theTitle)
      Constructor that takes the array of pictures, the wait time, and the title
      SlideShow(Picture[] pictArray, java.lang.String theTitle)
      A constructor that takes the array of pictures and a title
